main.1: 1 small sweet potato, peeled and diced
main.2: 1/2 cup of black beans, drained and rinsed
main.4: 1/4 cup of diced red bell pepper
main.6: 1/2 teaspoon of smoked paprika Salt-free seasoning blend (to taste)

1.title: Easy to prepare
1.description:
In a bowl, mix chia seeds and almond milk. Let it sit in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight.
          Layer chia pudding with mixed berries in a glass.
          Drizzle honey or maple syrup on top and sprinkle with sliced almonds.
